author: jvanzyl
msg: Adding some logic to check for the test directories, and introducing
a new testSourcesPresent property into the build so that testing will
be bypassed if there are no test sources. Thanks to Erik Hatcher

author: jvanzyl
msg: Only run the tests if there are test source directories available.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Clarify the specification of testSourceDirectories so that only directories
that contain tests are listed. This previously wasn't clear.

author: jvanzyl
msg: The wrong version of the dvsl JAR went into the install. Thanks to
Erik Hatcher for pointing that out.
